original: 3.4.38/.yaṃ vā manyeta mātā^pitror asamīkṣayā svayam apy ayam indriya^daurbalyān mayi pravartiṣyata iti priya^hita^upacārair abhīkṣṇa^saṃdarśanena  #

original: 3.4.46/.yadā tu manyeta^anurakto mayi na vyāvartiṣyata iti tadā^eva^enam abhiyuñjānaṃ bāla^bhāva^mokṣāya *tvarayet[ch:tvaret]/

analyzed: ca anyāḥ api samāna jātīyāḥ kanyāḥ śakuntalā ādyāḥ sva buddhyā bhartāram prāpya saṃprayuktāḥ modante sma tāḥ ca asyāḥ nidarśayet

original: 3.5.12/.pratipannām abhipreta^avakāśa^vartinīṃ nāyakaḥ śrotriya^āgārād agnim ānāyya kuśān āstīrya yathāsmṛti hutvā ca triḥ parikramet/

original: 3.5.14/.agni^sākṣikā hi vivāhā na nivartanta ity ācārya^samayaḥ//(p.228)

original: 3.5.19/.apratipadyamānāyām antaś cāriṇīm anyāṃ kula^pramadāṃ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭāṃ prīyamāṇāṃ ca^upagṛhya tayā saha viṣahyam avakāśam enām anya^kārya^apadeśena^ānayayet/

original: 3.5.23/.bhrātaram asyā vā samāna^vayasaṃ veśyāsu parastrīṣu vā prasaktam asukareṇa sāhāya^dānena priya^upagrahaiś ca sudīrgha^kālam anurañjayet/

original: 3.5.24/.prāyeṇa hi yuvānaḥ samāna^śīla^vyasana^vayasāṃ vayasyānām arthe jīvitam api tyajanti/

original: 3.5.25/.aṣṭamī^candrika^ādiṣu ca dhātreyikā madanīyam enāṃ pāyayitvā kiṃ cid ātmanaḥ kāryam uddiśya nāyakasya viṣahyaṃ deśam ānayet/

original: 3.5.26/.suptāṃ ca^ekacāriṇīṃ dhātreyikāṃ vārayitvā saṃjñām apratipadyamānāṃ dūṣayitvā^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.230)

original: 4.1.47/.āgate ca prakṛtisthāyā eva prathamato darśanaṃ daivata^pūjanam upahārāṇāṃ ca^āharaṇam iti pravāsa^caryā//

original: 4.1.49ab/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ labhante sthānam eva ca/(p.242)
analyzed: artham tathā kāmam labhante sthānam eva

original: 4.2.1/.jāḍya^dauḥśīlya^daurbhāgyebhyaḥ prajān utpatter ābhīkṣṇyena dārika^utpatter nāyaka^cāpalād vā sapatny^adhivedanam//(p.242)
analyzed: prajān utpatteḥ ābhīkṣṇyena dārikā utpatteḥ nāyaka cāpalāt vā
eva bhakti śīla vaidagdhya khyāpanena parijihīrṣed

original: prajān utpattau ca svayam eva sāpatnake codayet//(p.242)
analyzed: prajān utpattau ca svayam eva sāpatnake

original: 4.2.3/.adhividyamānā ca yāvac chakti^yogād ātmano +adhikatvena sthitiṃ kārayet//(p.243)
analyzed: ca yāvat śakti yogāt ātmanaḥ adhika tvena sthitim

original: nāyaka^viditaṃ ca prādoṣikaṃ vidhim atīva yatnād asyāḥ kārayet saubhāgyajaṃ vaikṛtam utsekaṃ vā^asyā na^adriyeta//(p.243)
analyzed: nāyaka viditam ca prādoṣikam vidhim atīva yatnāt asyāḥ kārayet saubhāgya jam vaikṛtam utsekam

original: yatra manyeta^artham iyaṃ svayam api pratipatsyata iti tatra^enām ādarata eva^anuśiṣyāt//(p.243)
analyzed: yatra manyeta artham iyam svayam api pratipatsyate iti tatra enām ādarata

original: 4.2.9/.yāṃ tu nāyako +adhikāṃ cikīrṣet tāṃ bhūta^pūrva^subhagayā protsāhya kalahayet//(p.244)
analyzed: tu nāyakaḥ adhikām cikīrṣet tām bhūta pūrva subhagayā protsāhya

original: 4.2.11/.tābhir ekatvena^adhikāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ svayam avivadamānā durjanī kuryāt//(p.244)
analyzed: eka tvena adhikām cikīrṣitām svayam a vivadamānā durjanī

original: 4.2.12/.nāyakena tu kalahitām enāṃ pakṣapātāv alambana^upabṛṃhitām āśvāsayet//(p.244)
analyzed: tu kalahitām enām pakṣapātau a lambana aupabṛṃhitām

original: 4.2.14/.mandaṃ vā kalaham upalabhya svayam eva saṃdhukṣayet//(p.245)
4.2.15/.yadi nāyako +asyām adya^api sānunaya iti manyeta tadā svayam eva saṃdhau prayateta^iti jyeṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.245)
analyzed: nāyakaḥ asyām adya api sa anunayaḥ iti manyeta tadā svayam eva saṃdhau prayateta eti

original: 4.2.26/.tat tu ślāghayā rāgeṇa vā bahir na^acakṣīta//(p.246)

analyzed: ca nigūḍha saṃmāna arthinī syāt iti

original: 4.2.29/.durbhagām anapatyāṃ ca jyeṣṭhām anukampeta nāyakena ca^anukampayet//(p.246)
4.2.30/.prasahya tv enām ekacāriṇī^vṛttam anutiṣṭhed iti kaniṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.246)
analyzed: tu enām ekacāriṇī vṛttam anutiṣṭhet iti

original: 4.2.31/.vidhavā tv indriya^daurbalyād āturā bhoginaṃ guṇa^saṃpannaṃ ca yā punar vindet sā punarbhūḥ//(p.247)
analyzed: tu indriya daurbalyāt āturā bhoginam guṇa saṃpannam ca yā punar vindet sā

original: 4.2.32/.yatas tu svecchayā punar api niṣkramaṇaṃ nirguṇo +ayam iti tadā anyaṃ kāṅkṣed iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.247)
analyzed: tu sva icchayā punar api niṣkramaṇam nirguṇaḥ ayam iti tadā anyam kāṅkṣet iti

original: 4.2.34/.guṇeṣu sopabhogeṣu sukha^sākalyaṃ tasmāt tato viśeṣa iti gonardīyaḥ//(p.247)
analyzed: sa upabhogeṣu sukha sākalyam tasmāt tatas viśeṣaḥ iti
bāndhavaiḥ nāyakāt āpānaka audyāna śraddhā dāna mitra pūjana ādi vyaya sahiṣṇu karma

original: 4.2.37/.ātmanaḥ sāreṇa vālaṃkāraṃ tadīyam ātmīyaṃ vā bibhṛyāt//(p.248)
analyzed: sāreṇa vā alaṃkāram tadīyam ātmīyam vā

original: 4.2.39/.svecchayā ca gṛhān nirgacchantī prīti^dāyād anyan nāyaka^dattaṃ jīyeta/
analyzed: ca gṛhāt nirgacchantī prīti dāyāt anyat nāyaka dattam jīyeta

original: niṣkāsyamānā tu na kiṃ cid dadyāt//(p.248)

analyzed: parijane sarvatra sa parihāsā mitreṣu pratipattiḥ
parijane mitra varge ca adhikam viśrāṇanam
samāja āpānaka audyāna yātrā vihāra śīla tā ca eti

original: 4.2.45/.durbhagā tu sāpatnaka^pīḍitā yā tāsām adhikam iva patyāv upacaret tām āśrayet/
analyzed: tu sāpatnaka pīḍitā yā tāsām adhikam iva patyau upacaret tām āśrayet

original: 4.2.47/.tan mitrāṇi ca^upagṛhya tair bhaktim ātmanaḥ prakāśayet//(p.250)
analyzed: mitrāṇi ca eva upagṛhya taiḥ bhaktim ātmanaḥ
ca puras cāriṇī syāt vrata aupavāsayoḥ

original: 4.2.52/.yayā ca kalahitaḥ syāt kāmaṃ tām āvartayet//(p.250)
4.2.53/.yāṃ ca pracchannāṃ kāmayet tām anena saha saṃgamayed gopayec ca//(p.250)
analyzed: ca pracchannām kāmayet tām anena saha saṃgamayet gopayet

original: 4.2.54/.yathā ca pativratātvam aśāṭhyaṃ nāyako manyeta tathā prativid adhyād iti durbhagā^vṛttam//(p.251)
analyzed: ca pativratā tvam a śāṭhyam nāyakaḥ manyeta tathā prativid adhyāt iti

original: 4.2.55/.antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca vṛttam eteṣv eva prakaraṇeṣu lakṣayet//(p.251)
4.2.56/.mālyā^anulepana^vāsāṃsi ca^āsāṃ kañcukīyā mahattarikā vā rājño nivedayeyur devībhiḥ prahitam iti/
analyzed: ca āsām kañcukīyāḥ mahattarikāḥ vā rājñaḥ nivedayeyuḥ devībhiḥ prahitam iti

original: 4.2.58/.alaṃkṛtaś ca svalaṃkṛtāni ca^aparāhṇe sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇya^ekadhyena paśyet//(p.251)
analyzed: ca su alaṃkṛtāni ca aparāhṇe sarvāṇi antaḥpurāṇi aikadhyena

original: 4.2.59/.tāsāṃ yathā^kālaṃ yathā^arhaṃ ca sthāna^māna^anuvṛttiḥ saparihāsāś ca kathāḥ kuryāt//(p.251)
analyzed: yathākālam yathāarham ca sthāna māna anuvṛttiḥ sa parihāsāḥ ca kathāḥ

original: 4.2.63 /.vāsaka^pālyas tu yasyā vāsako yasyāś ca^atīto yasyāś ca ṛtus tat^paricārika^anugatā
analyzed: vāsakapālyaḥ tu yasyāḥ vāsakaḥ yasyāḥ ca atītaḥ yasyāḥ ca ṛtuḥ tad paricārika anugatā

original: divā śayyā^utthitasya rājñas tābhyāṃ prahitam aṅgulīyaka^aṅkam anulepanam ṛtuṃ vāsakaṃ
analyzed: divā śayyā utthitasya rājñaḥ tābhyām prahitam aṅgulīyaka aṅkam anulepanam ṛtum vāsakam

original: 4.2.64/.tatra rājā yad gṛhṇīyāt tasyā vāsakam ājñāpayet//(p.252)

analyzed: ca sarvāsām anurūpeṇa pūjā āpānakam ca
aparikliṣṭaḥ ca karma yogaḥ iti āntaḥpurikam

original: 4.2.67ab/.puruṣas tu bahūn dārān samāhṛtya samo bhavet/(p.253)
4.2.67cd/.na ca^avajñāṃ cared āsu vyalīkān na saheta ca//(p.253)
analyzed: ca avajñām caret āsu vyalīkāt na saheta

original: 4.2.68cd/.visrambhād vā^apy upālambhas tam anyāsu na kīrtayet//(p.253)
analyzed: vā api upālambhaḥ tam anyāsu na

original: 4.2.69ab/.na dadyāt prasaraṃ strīṇāṃ sapatnyāḥ kāraṇe kva cit/(p.253)
analyzed: dadyāt prasaram strīṇām sapatnyāḥ kāraṇe kva

original: 4.2.70cd/.bahu^mānais tathā ca^anyām ity evaṃ rañjayet striyaḥ//(p.253)
analyzed: tathā ca anyām iti evam rañjayet

original: 5.1.strīpuruṣaśīlavasthāpanaṃ vyāvartanakāraṇāṇi strīṣu siddhāḥ puruṣā ayatnasādhyā yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: vyāvartana kāraṇāṇi strīṣu siddhāḥ puruṣāḥ ayatna sādhyāḥ yoṣitaḥ

original: 5.1.2/.teṣu sādhyatvam anatyayaṃ gamyatvam āyatiṃ vṛttiṃ ca^ādita eva parīkṣeta//
analyzed: sādhya tvam anatyayam gamya tvam āyatim vṛttim ca āditas eva parīkṣeta

original: 5.1.3/.yadā tu sthānāt sthāna^antaraṃ kāmaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ paśyet tad^ātma^śarīra^upaghāta^trāṇa^arthaṃ para^parigrahān abhyupagacchet//(p.255)
analyzed: tu sthānāt sthāna antaram kāmam pratipadyamānam paśyet tad ātma śarīra aupaghāta trāṇa artham para parigrahān

original: 5.1.5/.cakṣuḥ^prītir manaḥ^saṅgaḥ saṃkalpa^utpattir nidrā^ācchedas tanutā viṣayebhyo vyāvṛttir lajjā^praṇāśa unmādo mūrchā maraṇam iti teṣāṃ
analyzed: manaḥ saṅgaḥ saṃkalpa autpattiḥ nidrā ācchedaḥ tanu tā viṣayebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ lajjā praṇāśaḥ unmādaḥ mūrchā maraṇam iti teṣām

original: 5.1.6/.tatra^ākṛtito lakṣaṇataś ca yuvatyāḥ śīlaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ sādhyatāṃ caṇḍa^vegatāṃ ca lakṣayed ity ācāryāḥ//(p.256)
analyzed: lakṣaṇataḥ ca yuvatyāḥ śīlam satyam śaucam sādhya tām caṇḍa vega tām ca lakṣayet iti

original: 5.1.7/.vyabhicārād ākṛti^lakṣaṇa^yogānām iṅgita^ākārābhyām eva pravṛttir boddhavyā yoṣita iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.256)
analyzed: ākṛti lakṣaṇa yogānām iṅgita ākārābhyām eva pravṛttiḥ boddhavyā yoṣitaḥ iti

original: 5.1.8/.yaṃ kaṃ cid ujjvalaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā strī kāmayate/
analyzed: kam cit ujjvalam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā strī kāmayate

original: 5.1.10/.na strī dharmam adharmaṃ ca^apekṣate kāmayata eva/
analyzed: strī dharmam adharmam ca apekṣate kāmayate eva
ca puruṣeṇa abhiyujyamānā cikīrṣantī api vyāvartate

original: 5.1.13/.puruṣas tu dharma^sthitim ārya^samayaṃ ca^apekṣya kāmayamāno +api vyāvartate/
analyzed: tu dharma sthitim ārya samayam ca apekṣya kāmayamānaḥ api vyāvartate
anāyatiḥ anyatra prasakta matiḥ iti ca
sama rathaḥ vā eti bhayam mṛgyāḥ
asya mā bhūt aniṣṭam iti anukampā
satī sva jana bahiṣkṛtā bhaviṣyāmi iti bhayam
yat ātmani lakṣayet tat āditas eva

original: kathā^ākhyāna^kuśalo bālyāt prabhṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pravṛddha^yauvanaḥ krīḍana^karma^ādinā^āgata^viśvāsaḥ
analyzed: kathā ākhyāna kuśalaḥ bālyāt prabhṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pravṛddha yauvanaḥ krīḍana karma ādinā āgata viśvāsaḥ

original: preṣaṇasya kartā^ucita^saṃbhāṣaṇaḥ priyasya kartā^anyasya bhūta^pūrvo dūto marmajña

original: nava^varakaḥ prekṣa^udyāna^tyāga^śīlo vṛṣa iti siddha^pratāpaḥ sāhasikaḥ śūro vidyā^rūpa^guṇa^upabhogaiḥ patyur atiśayitā mahārha^veṣa^upacāraś
analyzed: nava varakaḥ prekṣā audyāna tyāga śīlaḥ vṛṣaḥ iti siddha pratāpaḥ sāhasikaḥ śūraḥ vidyā rūpa guṇa aupabhogaiḥ patyuḥ atiśayitā mahārha veṣa aupacāraḥ
yoṣitaḥ tu imāḥ abhiyoga mātra sādhyāḥ

original: 5.1.54/.kanyā^kāle yatnena varitā kathaṃ cid alabdha^abhiyuktā ca sā tadānīṃ samāna^buddhi^śīla^medhā^pratipatti^sātmyā/
analyzed: yatnena varitā katham cit alabdha abhiyuktā ca sā tadānīm samāna buddhi śīla medhā pratipatti sātmyā
īrṣyālu pūti cokṣa klība dīrghasūtra kāpuruṣa kubja vāmana virūpa maṇikāḥ a grāmya durgandhi rogi vṛddha bhāryāḥ ca eti
svayam abhiyoga sādhyā na tathā dūtyā

original: para^striyas tu sūkṣma^bhāvā dūtī^sādhyā na tathā^ātmanā^ity ācāryāḥ//(p.265)
analyzed: para striyaḥ tu sūkṣma bhāvāḥ dūtī sādhyāḥ na tathā ātmanā iti

original: 5.2.2/.sarvatra śakti^viṣaye svayaṃ sādhanam upapannatarakaṃ durupapādatvāt tasya dūtī^prayoga iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.265)
analyzed: śakti viṣaye svayam sādhanam upapannatarakam durupapāda tvāt tasya dūtī prayogaḥ iti
a niyantraṇa saṃbhāṣāḥ ca svayam pratāryāḥ

original: 5.2.4/.svayam abhiyokṣyamāṇas tv ādāv eva paricayaṃ kuryāt//(p.265)

analyzed: ātmanaḥ bhavana saṃnikarṣe prāyatnikam mitra jñāti mahāmātra vaidya bhavana saṃnikarṣe

original: 5.2.7 /.darśane ca^asyāḥ satataṃ sākāraṃ prekṣaṇaṃ keśa^saṃyamanaṃ nakhāc churaṇam
analyzed: darśane ca asyāḥ satatam sa ākāram prekṣaṇam keśa saṃyamanam nakhāt śuraṇam

original: ābharaṇa^prahlādanam adhara^oṣṭha^vimardanaṃ tās tāś ca līlā vayasyaiḥ saha prekṣamāṇāyās
analyzed: ābharaṇa prahlādanam adhara oṣṭha vimardanam tāḥ tāḥ ca līlāḥ vayasyaiḥ saha prekṣamāṇāyāḥ

original: tat^saṃbaddhāḥ para^apadeśinyaś ca kathās tyāga^upabhoga^prakāśanaṃ sakhyur utsaṅga^niṣaṇṇasya
analyzed: tad saṃbaddhāḥ para apadeśinyaḥ ca kathāḥ tyāga aupabhoga prakāśanam sakhyuḥ utsaṅga niṣaṇṇasya

original: sāṅga^bhaṅgaṃ jṛṃbhaṇam ekabhrū^kṣepaṇaṃ manda^vākyatā tad^vākya^śravaṇaṃ tām uddiśya

original: bālena^anya^janena vā sahānya^upadiṣṭā dvyarthā kathā tasyāṃ svayaṃ manoratha^avedanam
analyzed: bālena anya janena vā saha anya aupadiṣṭā dvyarthā kathā tasyām svayam manoratha avedanam

original: anya^apadeśena tām eva^uddiśya bāla^cumbanam āliṅganaṃ ca jihvayā ca^asya tāmbūla^dānaṃ
analyzed: anya apadeśena tām evā uddiśya bāla cumbanam āliṅganam ca jihvayā ca asya tāmbūla dānam

original: pradeśinyā hanu^deśa^ghaṭṭanaṃ tat tad yathā^yogaṃ yathā^avakāśaṃ ca prayoktavyam /
analyzed: pradeśinyāḥ hanu deśa ghaṭṭanam tat tat yathāyogam yathāavakāśam ca prayoktavyam

original: 5.2.8 /.tasyāś ca^aṅkagatasya bālasya lālanaṃ bāla^krīḍanakānāṃ ca^asya dānaṃ grahaṇaṃ
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca aṅka gatasya bālasya lālanam bāla krīḍanakānām ca asya dānam grahaṇam

original: tena saṃnikṛṣṭatvāt kathā^yojanaṃ tat^saṃbhāṣaṇa^kṣameṇa janena ca prītim āsādya

original: kāryaṃ tad^anubandhaṃ ca gamana^agamanasya yojanaṃ saṃśraye ca^asyās tām apaśyato
analyzed: kāryam tad anubandham ca gamana a gamanasya yojanam saṃśraye ca asyāḥ tām a paśyataḥ

original: 5.2.9/.prasṛte tu paricaye tasyā haste nyāsaṃ nikṣepaṃ ca nidadhyāt/
analyzed: tu paricaye tasyāḥ haste nyāsam nikṣepam ca nidadhyāt
tat pratidinam pratikṣaṇam ca eka deśataḥ gṛhnīyāt

original: 5.2.10/.tām ātmano dāraiḥ saha visrambha^goṣṭhyāṃ vivikta^āsane ca yojayet
analyzed: ātmanaḥ dāraiḥ saha visrambha goṣṭhyām vivikta āsane ca yojayet

original: 5.2.12/.suvarṇakāra^maṇikāra^vaikaṭika^nīlīkusumbha^rañjka^ādiṣu ca kāma^arthinyāṃ saha^ātmano vaśyaiś ca^eṣāṃ tat^saṃpādane svayaṃ prayateta/
analyzed: ca kāma arthinyām saha ātmanaḥ vaśyaiḥ ca eṣām tad saṃpādane svayam prayateta
anuṣṭhāna niratasya loka viditaḥ dīrgha kālam saṃdarśana yogaḥ

original: 5.1.15/.yena karmaṇā dravyeṇa kauśalena ca^arthinī syāt tasya prayogam utpattim āgamam upāyaṃ vijñānaṃ ca^ātma^āyattaṃ darśayet/
analyzed: karmaṇā dravyeṇa kauśalena ca arthinī syāt tasya prayogam utpattim āgamam upāyam vijñānam ca ātma āyattam darśayet

original: 5.2.16/.pūrva^pravṛtteṣu loka^cariteṣu dravya^guṇa^parīkṣāsu ca tayā tat^parijanena ca saha vivādaḥ/
analyzed: loka cariteṣu dravya guṇa parīkṣāsu ca tayā tad parijanena ca saha vivādaḥ

original: 5.2.17/.tatra nirdiṣṭāni paṇitāni teṣv enāṃ prāśnikatvena yojayet/
analyzed: nirdiṣṭāni paṇitāni teṣu enām prāśnika tvena yojayet

original: 5.2.18/.tayā tu vivadamāno +atyantād bhutam iti brūyād iti paricaya^kāraṇāni//(p.268)
analyzed: tu vivadamānaḥ atyantāt bhutam iti brūyāt iti

nirbhinna sadbhāvāyām samupabhoga vyatikare tadīyāni upayuñjīta

mahārha gandham spṛhaṇīyam sva nakha daśana pada cihnitam sa ākāram dadyāt

original: 5.2.24/.krameṇa ca vivikta^deśe gamanam āliṅganaṃ cumbanaṃ tāmbūlasya grāhaṇaṃ dāna^ante dravyāṇāṃ parivartanaṃ guhya^deśa^abhimarśanaṃ ca^ity
